name: Turn based tennis
description:
The goal is to make the other player miss the ball.

You need to be under the ball and for the 8 arrows to show up to send it to your opponent.

Controls :

Arrows/D-pad to move or give a direction to the ball when asked (8 arrows around)
Space/Gamepad Face Bottom button (A on xbox controller) to stay we're you are or send the ball right in front

How to play :

This is an online game where one of the player must be the server and send his IP to the other player.
The server player must open the port 7777 and then launch "PlayAsServer.bat", there he will get his IP.
And the other player must launch "PlayAsClient.bat" and enter the server IP.
